verbs.description: [ARG0: Top Congressional leaders] [V: huddled] [ARG1: with President Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: just ahead of a House vote to avert a shutdown] .
Top Congressional leaders huddled with President Donald Trump at the White House Thursday just ahead of a House vote to [V: avert] [ARG1: a shutdown] .
